mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa
Interface EntityFSM.State

Enclosing interface:
EntityFSM
public static interface EntityFSM.State

A State is an interface for control aspects of an EntityFSM. A concrete State must contain no data members and must be a singleton instance. All instance-specific data members must be held in the EntityFSM context classes, which are passed in to the FSM.State whenever a method is called.
